name: What'sMyFlick
0:
”Alexa, begin choose my show”
”Alexa, start choose my show”
”Alexa, launch choose my show”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: choose my show
des:
Tired of searching what to binge or ask peers what to watch on the OTT Platform. Here's a skill What's My Flick (Unofficial) built for you that will do all the heavy lifting and suggest to you the shows on What's My Flick? (Unofficial) Get ready for a blind pick. What are you waiting for Go and enjoy the shows on OTT Platforms as from the suggestion made in a hassle-free manner.
Note: The skill doesn't endorse Netflix and is a 3rd party built a complementary skill for Alexa users who watch shows on Netflix, PrimeVideo, or other OTT Platforms.
Disclaimer: The skill best works best on smart speaker devices having a display. To make it more interesting, the skill will suggest movies of Non-English Languages too.
Thanks for the love and support. Please do follow yashochitraka on Instagram and to provide feedback/suggestions and please do visit: https://www.yashochitraka.com to find out interesting Alexa Skills built for you with love.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
